name: The Comodo
subtitle: Luxury in the Mountains
short_description: A modern mountain retreat offering breathtaking views of the Swiss Alps and exceptional service.
description:
The Comodo is a modern alpine retreat nestled in the picturesque town of Crans-Montana, Switzerland. The hotel combines traditional Swiss architecture with contemporary design elements, creating a unique atmosphere that is both luxurious and welcoming.

Surrounded by the majestic peaks of the Swiss Alps, guests can enjoy breathtaking panoramic views from their rooms and the hotel's terraces. The Comodo is the perfect base for exploring the natural beauty of the region, whether you're hiking in summer or skiing in winter.

The hotel's restaurant serves exceptional cuisine using locally sourced ingredients, and the spa offers a range of treatments to help you relax and rejuvenate after a day in the mountains.
price_notes: Prices may vary depending on season. All prices include breakfast and access to spa facilities.

features.title: Mountain View Spa
features.description: Our spa features floor-to-ceiling windows with panoramic mountain views, a heated indoor pool, sauna, steam room, and a range of treatments.

features.title: Alpine Restaurant
features.description: Our restaurant serves modern interpretations of traditional Swiss dishes using local, seasonal ingredients.

features.title: Ski-in/Ski-out Access
features.description: Direct access to the slopes of Crans-Montana, with a dedicated ski concierge to handle your equipment.

owner_information.name: Alpine Luxury Hotels Group
owner_information.description: A family-owned collection of premium hotels in the Swiss Alps, focused on authentic experiences and sustainable luxury.

meta_title: The Comodo | Luxury Mountain Retreat in Crans-Montana
meta_description: Experience alpine luxury at The Comodo, a modern mountain retreat in Crans-Montana offering panoramic views, exceptional dining, and direct ski access.

name: Schgaguler Hotel
subtitle: Minimalist Alpine Elegance
short_description: A minimalist design hotel in the heart of the Dolomites, offering an elegant retreat with stunning mountain views.
description:
Schgaguler Hotel is a family-run design hotel in the charming village of Castelrotto, at the foot of the Dolomites. Recently renovated by renowned architect Peter Pichler, the hotel presents a stunning minimalist aesthetic that complements its Alpine surroundings.

The hotel's interiors feature natural materials such as oak, stone, and linen, creating a serene atmosphere that allows guests to connect with the spectacular mountain landscape visible through floor-to-ceiling windows. Each room is a study in understated luxury, with custom-designed furniture and thoughtful details.

The hotel's spa offers a variety of treatments using local products, and the restaurant serves refined South Tyrolean cuisine with a focus on fresh, locally-sourced ingredients.
price_notes: Rates include half-board accommodation with breakfast and dinner. Special packages available for extended stays.

features.title: Design-Focused Architecture
features.description: Award-winning architecture by Peter Pichler creates a harmonious balance between modern design and alpine tradition.

features.title: Gourmet Half-Board
features.description: Experience the flavors of South Tyrol with our half-board option featuring locally-sourced ingredients and regional specialties.

features.title: Mountain Wellness
features.description: Our wellness area includes Finnish sauna, bio sauna, steam bath, and relaxation areas with panoramic mountain views.

owner_information.name: Schgaguler Family
owner_information.description: The Schgaguler family has been welcoming guests to Castelrotto for generations, combining traditional hospitality with contemporary vision.

meta_title: Schgaguler Hotel | Minimalist Design Hotel in the Dolomites
meta_description: Experience minimalist alpine luxury at Schgaguler Hotel, a design-focused retreat in Castelrotto with stunning views of the Dolomites and refined South Tyrolean cuisine.

name: Casa Cook Samos
subtitle: Bohemian Beachfront Luxury
short_description: A bohemian beach retreat on the Aegean island of Samos, offering laid-back luxury and a connection to nature.
description:
Casa Cook Samos is nestled against the sloping hillsides of the island's north coast, with stunning views of the Aegean Sea. The resort's design draws inspiration from traditional Greek island architecture, with an emphasis on indoor-outdoor living and natural materials.

The hotel features a collection of swimming pools that cascade down the hillside, creating multiple spaces for relaxation and socializing. Each room offers private terraces, many with swim-up pool access, allowing guests to enjoy the Mediterranean climate in privacy.

The resort's restaurant focuses on Greek cuisine with a modern twist, using locally-sourced ingredients and traditional cooking methods. The beach club offers a relaxed atmosphere for enjoying the crystal-clear waters of the Aegean.
price_notes: Prices include daily breakfast and welcome drink. Special offers available for early bookings and stays of 7 nights or more.

features.title: Terraced Swimming Pools
features.description: A series of pools cascading down the hillside, offering different atmospheres from lively to serene.

features.title: Beach Club
features.description: Our private beach club offers comfortable loungers, food and drink service, and water sports equipment.

features.title: Farm-to-Table Dining
features.description: Our restaurant sources ingredients from local farmers and fishermen, showcasing the best of Greek cuisine.

owner_information.name: Casa Cook Hotels
owner_information.description: Casa Cook Hotels is a collection of boutique retreats designed for the modern traveler, with locations across the Mediterranean.
